column6: Mostly useful in punish situations
Mid Heat Engager. Very useful for wall pressure
Approach and pressure tool that can enter Heat
Can be used to approach. Launches as a Heat Dash

column2:
1. Faster access to EXT DCK during Heat with df+3+4
2. Gains an unescapable throw in EXT DCK
3. LNH stance gains reversal properties
column6: Heat Engager from stance.
_Quick jab string. Can shift to different stances
_Mid poke with many extensions to pressure the opponent
_Quick low poke to harass the opponent
_Counterhit launcher for keepout and checking situations
_Mid counterhit move useful to deal with crouching opp.
_Low poke. Cancel into Ducking In to make it safe
_Short ranged low useful for pressure at the wall
_Explore these stances to improve your pressure
STANDING
1+2 (heat)
uf+2
